project.description:
Username Token. The following are needed in order for the services to work:
c.f. http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/java/library/j-jws10/index.html
1) Starting code-first, copy the generated WSDL and rename to wsit-<fully-qualified-service-name>.xml. Put it directly under WEB-INF. Starting contract-first, create the WSDL and provide the location in WEB-INF/sun-jaxws.xml file. 2) Add the WSIT extensions as needed. In this project, a username/password validator is configured. If a validator is not configured, the container's authentication mechanism will be used. 3) Deploy the service and verify that the policy is included in the generated WSDL.
c.f. http://www.ibm.com/developerworks/java/library/j-jws10/index.html
